description: Analyze domains and URL's via URLScan, with support for automated analysis and removal
install_msg:
## :white_check_mark: Successfully installed URLScan.
**Questions?** [We're listening](<https://www.beehive.systems/contact-us>)
**Interested in CyberSecurity and CyberSafety?** Join our Discord! https://discord.gg/ckdzsm7mTs

**IMPORTANT** - Before you can use this cog, you'll need to sign up for a URLScan account, then add your API Key to your Red instance.
Learn more and sign up for URLScan [**here**](<https://go.beehive.systems/URLScan>)
